page.title: 18LOCAL GIRLS GAMES IN A-IN-M
page.content: We play lots of games in our freetime such as {Scarecrow Tick,Normal {Tick,Chinese Skipping,}and lots of others.Scarecrow Tick is were somebody is "up",and when they "tick" (touch), they have to stand with their arms and legs apart,they are freed by someone passing under their arms or legs. Another game which is popular is hopscotch but the slightly younger children play it.We play a game called 'Leggit' where somebody throws a ball and if the person they throw it too does not catch it everbody runs away.They shout and then try to hit the person who is nearest with the ball.
